page.title: 07Interviews: local residents
page.content:
Mrs. Pickard interview continued.
She thought that the Earl and Countess were very nice and very strict. She can remember the Duke and Duchess of Gloucester and Princess Elizabeth coming to stay at Castle Hill. Mrs. Pickard remembers travelling on the Filleigh railway and went as far as Reading and London. She also got around on foot and by bicycle when she was young.
Lady Margaret Fortescue Lady Margaret recalls that it was too expensive to go to school, so until the age of fifteen she had a governess. Then she went to finishing school in Switzerland. She also went to school in England until the age of eighteen.
